name: Loompaland
startIntroPart1: The Oompa Loompas kept Looking for Other things to Mash Up With the Caterpillars to make them taste better, Red Bettles, Bark of the BongBong tree, All of them beastly!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be defeated!
attacked: You want to play? Is it possible for you to resist!
defeated: How is it possible that the enemies hurt us?
introduction: As we the Oompa Loompas greet you. We will also guide you to everything.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
